QuestData.Title: Calling in All Favors
QuestData.Description:
$p, the time has come.
We cannot allow Kel'Thuzad to wield the Ritualists' sorcery as a weapon. He must be destroyed.
Rally our forces. We march on the House of Rituals!
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Draka and allies at the House of Rituals.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Draka and allies at the House of Rituals.
QuestData.RewardText:
We were brought together by chance, but now we fight as one.
Our victory today will be one for all Maldraxxi.
